entries.title: Paul Auster and Eggs
entries.content: I'm obsessed with a scene from Paul Aster's book. He was counting down to the end.

entries.title: Haruki Murakami and the Well
entries.content: What I did in junior high sceince class was hiding behind my friends and reading books after books in hope that each book will make me smarter somehow.
